string-array.name: ntQuestions
string-array.item: "Which of the following is not a prime number?"
"Which of the following is a prime number?"
"What is the largest prime factor of 12345?"
"Which of the following is not the factor of 142857?"
"Which of the following is the closest to 0.5?"
"Which of the following is equal to 1/4?"
"Which of the following is an improper fraction?"
"What is the remainder when 47 is divided by 6?"
"What is the remainder when 5^6 = 5x5x5x5x5x5 is divided by 4?"
"Given a = 9^10 = 9x9x9x9x9x9x9x9x9x9. Let b be the sum of digits of a. Let c be the sum of digits of b. What is c?"

string-array.name: agbQuestions
string-array.item: "Given c = (a + 2b)/3. If a = 1 and b = 4, what is c?"
"Given x^2 + 4x + y^2 - 6y +13 = 0. What is the value of x + y? (Assume x and y are real numbers)"

string-array.name: cbQuestions
string-array.item: "I flip a fair coin. What is the probability that I get a tail?"
"I toss a fair coin two times. The first time I get a head. What is the probability that the second time I get a tail?"
"I toss a fair dice. What is the probability that I get an even number?"
"I toss a fair dice. What is the probability that I get the number '6'?"
"I toss a fair dice six times. For the first to fifth times, I get the numbers 1,2,3,4,5 respectively. What is the probability that the sixth toss results in the number '6'?"
"How many ways are there to arange 3 distinct candies in a straight line?"
"How many ways are there to arange 5 distinct books in a straight line?"
"How many ways are there to choose 1 car from 3 distinct cars?"
"How many ways are there to choose 2 apples from 4 distinct apples?"
"Given a + b = 9. What is the number of possible values of a?"

string-array.name: geoQuestions
string-array.item: "What is the interior angle of an equilateral triangle in degrees?"
"What is the interior angle of a rectangle in degrees?"
"Given two angles of a triangle are 30 and 60 degrees. What is the third angle in degrees?"
"Given an isosceles triangle ABC where AB = AC. If angle BAC = 40 degrees, what is angle ABC in degrees?"
"Find the area of a square with side length 5."
"Find the area of a rectangle with length 3 and width 5."
"Given the length of a rectangle is 4. If the width of the rectangle is 2 less than its length, what is the area of the rectangle?"
"Find the area of a circle with radius 2."
"Find the area of a circle whose perimeter is 10 pi."
"Given an isosceles triangle ABC where AB = AC. If angle ABC = 60 degrees and AB = 10 cm, what is the length of AC?"
